data.name: Endocrisis Hyperactive
data.detailed_description:
Endocrisis Hyperactive the next top-down shoot em up with intense action. Absorb bullets to increment your power and pass through levels with tons of enemies and bullets and, of course, intense boss battles.

The mastermind is off, and it is your task to activate it again. And a lot of enemies don't want that. So the only way left is to destroy everything and each guardian boss who wants to keep the mastermind off their rule.

Intense Shoot 'em up action

- Twin Stick or Mouse pointing
- Multiplayer Co-op
- Secret paths and bonus
- Combat against a big horde of enemies
- Absorb and block enemy bullets
- Retro style

data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940MX or superior
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
